Name: [Ether] Unstable Tranquilizer
Desc: Dealing <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color> to an enemy increases Attribute Anomaly DMG <color=#2BAD00>50%</color> against the target for 10s.
Desc2: Limits movement by slowly eroding the target's Ether stability. Primarily effective against targets within the Hollows.
